translation_by: Put your name here if translating :)

error.NOT_REGISTERED: **You're not registered with the bot!** Try `/login`.
error.INVALID_COOKIES: Whoops, that didn't work! Are your cookies formatted correctly?
error.UNEXPECTED_2FA: **Not expecting a 2FA code!** Try `/login` if you're not logged in.
error.LOGIN_RATELIMIT:
**Too many people are logging in at the same time**
Please try again later.
error.FORGET_FORGOTTEN: You are not registered with the bot
error.AUTH_ERROR_SHOP: **Couldn't fetch your shop**, you may have been logged out. Try `/login`.
error.AUTH_ERROR_BUNDLES: **Couldn't fetch your bundles**, you may have been logged out. Try `/login`.
error.AUTH_ERROR_NMARKET: **Couldn't fetch your Night Market**, you may have been logged out. Try `/login`.
error.AUTH_ERROR_BALANCE: **Couldn't fetch your balance**, you may have been logged out. Try `/login`.
error.AUTH_ERROR_BPASS: **Couldn't fetch your battlepass progression**, you may have been logged out. Try `/login`.
error.AUTH_ERROR_ALERTS: **Your alerts cannot be verified**, you may have been logged out. Try `/login`.
error.AUTH_ERROR_ALERTS_HAPPENED: **Your alerts cannot be verified**, you may have been logged out. Try `/login`.
error.SKIN_NOT_FOUND: **Couldn't find a skin with that name!** Check the spelling and try again.
error.BUNDLE_NOT_FOUND: **Couldn't find a bundle with that name!** Check the spelling and try again.
error.MAINTENANCE: **Valorant servers are currently down for maintenance!** Try again later.
error.STATS_DISABLED: **Shop statistics are currently disabled for this bot!**
error.EMPTY_STATS: **I have no shop stats to display!** use `/shop` to get started.
error.NO_STATS_FOR_SKIN: **That skin hasn't been in anyone's shop** in the past {d} days!
error.NOT_UR_MESSAGE_STATS: **That's not your message!** Use `/stats` to browse skin stats.
error.NOT_UR_MESSAGE_BUNDLE: **invalid user** Use `/bundle` to search for bundles.
error.NOT_UR_MESSAGE_ALERT: **invalid user** Use `/alert` to set your own alert.
error.NO_ALERTS: **no alerts set up** Use `/alert` to get started.
error.NO_NMARKET: **There is no Night Market currently going on!**
error.TOO_MANY_ACCOUNTS: **You can only have maximum {n} accounts on the bot!** Try `/remove` to remove accounts

info.BUNDLES_HEADER_DESC: Use `/bundle` to inspect a specific bundle
info.BUNDLE_CHOICE: Which bundle would you like to inspect?
info.ALERT_CHOICE: Which skin would you like to set a reminder for?
info.ALERT_SET: Successfully set an alert for the **{s}**!
info.ONE_ALERT: You have one alert set up:
info.MULTIPLE_ALERTS: The alerts you currently have set up:
info.REMOVE_ALERTS_FOOTER: Click on a button to remove the alert:
info.ALERT_TEST: the bot has permissions to send alerts in this channel!
info.MFA_EMAIL: **Riot sent a code to {e}** Use `/2fa` to complete your login.
info.MFA_EMAIL_HIDDEN: **Riot sent a code to your email address!** Use `/2fa` to complete your login.
info.MFA_GENERIC: **You have 2FA enabled!** use `/2fa` to enter your code.
info.ACCOUNT_DELETED: Your account has been deleted from the database!
info.SPECIFIC_ACCOUNT_DELETED: The account **{n}. {u}** has been deleted from the database!
info.STATS_HEADER: Skin stats based on **{c}** different shops *(page **{p}** of **{t}**)*
info.STATS_CHOICE: Which skin would you like to see the stats of?
info.ACCOUNTS_HEADER: All your accounts with the bot:

settings.SET_QUESTION: What do you want to set the setting **{s}** to?
settings.CONFIRMATION: The setting **{s}** is now set to **{v}**.
settings.privateShop: Allow others to use /shop with your username
